data.title: Verity Records
data.meta_description: Founded in 1994, Verity Records is home to one of the most robust catalogs in gospel, including releases from iconic artists such as Yolanda Adams, Helen Baylor, Vanessa Bell Armstrong, Twinkie Clark, Daryl Coley, Fred Hammond, John P. Kee, Donnie McClurkin, Marvin Sapp, Richard Smallwood and Hezekiah Walker. It has become the most celebrated Gospel […]
data.text:
Founded in 1994, Verity Records is home to one of the most robust catalogs in gospel, including releases from iconic artists such as Yolanda Adams, Helen Baylor, Vanessa Bell Armstrong, Twinkie Clark, Daryl Coley, Fred Hammond, John P. Kee, Donnie McClurkin, Marvin Sapp, Richard Smallwood and Hezekiah Walker. It has become the most celebrated Gospel Label in the world. This distinction is – in large part – due to your love of the genre, our artists, and their releases. Your support has played just as big a part of Verity’s accomplishments as our efforts.

Founded in 1994, Verity Records is home to one of the most robust catalogs in gospel, including releases from iconic artists such as Yolanda Adams, Helen Baylor, Vanessa Bell Armstrong, Twinkie Clark, Daryl Coley, Fred Hammond, John P. Kee, Donnie McClurkin, Marvin Sapp, Richard Smallwood and Hezekiah Walker. It has become the most celebrated Gospel Label in the world. This distinction is – in large part – due to your love of the genre, our artists, and their releases. Your support has played just as big a part of Verity’s accomplishments as our efforts.

Because of this, #WeAreVerity:

You, us, the artists, the music.

We vow to never forget where we come from and relaunched Verity Records to showcase the breadth and depth of our catalogue hits. Join us by taking a picture of your favorite Verity artist, song, or memorabilia and post it to social media using the hashtag #WeAreVerity. We can’t wait to continue the celebration with you.

Thanks for being part of the family!
